entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
